purr.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: if a cat purrs, it makes a soft low sound in its throat to show that it is pleased
purr.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: if the engine of a vehicle or machine purrs, it works perfectly and makes a quiet smooth sound
purr.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: The big Bentley purred along the road.
purr.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: to speak in a soft low sexy voice
